DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim study assess effectiveness web-based Guided Self-Determination program among adult type 2 diabetes general practice order improve diabetes self-management behaviour HbA1c enhance patient activation , self-care competence , autonomy .
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Guided Self-Determination Intervention Adults With Type 2 Diabetes General Practice
DOC.detailed_description: Web-based self-management program potential support adult type 2 diabetes manage disease condition . However , improve health care outcomes self-management intervention show somewhat ambiguous result . Therefore , suggest intervention theory-based incorporate well-defined counsel method technique behavioural change . To meet challenge , overall aim study assess effectiveness theory-driven web-based Guided Self-Determination intervention among adult type 2 diabetes general practice order enable adult diabetes use individual resource self-manage condition reach treatment goal . A complex intervention design base framework UK Medical Research Council employ guide develop evaluate intervention . This study consist three phase : 1. model phase adapt original Guided Self-Determination program adult type 2 diabetes , use qualitative design 2. feasibility assessment adapt intervention web , employ qualitative quantitative method 3. evaluate effectiveness intervention diabetes self-management behaviour HbA1c , use quasi-experimental design . The two first phase provide important information development intervention acceptability , whereas third phase assess effect health care outcomes systematically develop intervention .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes duration â‰¥ 3 month Ability communicate Norwegian Access internet bank ID Patients cognitive impairment Patients severe comorbidity
